Ships of Pan-America

Ships of Pan-America

Jump to: navigation , search
The Pan-America faction does not cover a specific nation, but includes ships from a variety of nations from Central and South America. Currently, only one South American navy is represented in World of Warships: the Argentine Republic. In-game, each ship flies the individual jack of their respective navy (as shown below) in lieu of the Pan-American flag.
ARA Nueve de Julio , Tier VII cruiser
Armada de la República Argentina (ARA)

Cruisers


VII   Nueve de Julio
